8bd043c7-4aca-4315-81ae-ec25ee98913c.Text: The Sweep ability of an axe and the Shove ability of a hammer or mace cost −1 AP less (but no less than 1). Knives recover {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} MP upon a successful hit. They also do +{unit_stat|WarhammerWeaponSkill}% damage on targets with less than 50% HP. Primitive, Blade, and Exotic weapons gain base damage equal to the current weapon's minimum damage. Blade weapons gain critical damage equal to (20 + ({unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} x 3)%, dodge reduction equal to -(5 + {unit_stat|WarhammerWeaponSkill|bonus}), and +15 critical hit chance.
